review: I have 3 roku media streamers for my TV's and thought I would take a chance on this since I got it on sale as a Prime Member.  It was worth the $20 I spent on it for sure.  Navigation is easy, and since I have a Kindle Fire HD I can use the kindle as a remote or navigation tool with the Fire TV Stick.  I liked it so much that I moved it from a bedroom TV to the main TV.
author: M Fischer

review: This thing drops the connection every 15 seconds despite being 15 feet from a high end router.  My roku 3 works great downstairs 30 feet away.  Do not purchase this.  I am using the HDMI extender and it does nothing.  This device has so far been the worst thing I have ever purchased from amazon.
author: John

review: easy to install, started up easily

review: I purchased a competitors model and it stopped working after an update.  I should have never doubted Fire TV Stick. My expectations have been exceeded by this item and my kiddo loves the games.
author: Michael Washington

review: Love the Amazon Fire Stick, except that our 4 year old  grandson is a little too handy with it and has ordered 4 movies.  The remote is now up on a very high shelf.  It is wonderful, but watch out for the users.

review: Annoyingly drops connection. Have to unplug and replug in the device.  ISP and router not the issue. Pending customer service review of issue. Updated to follow.

review: What can I say - I stream Netflix and Amazon Prime anytime I wish on our Workshop HDTV! Remote is simple, yet I find easy to understand with the on-screen menus.
